Text: Quality is just appalling. Even the sample has someone's sleeve flapping in the way and as for the sound quality, you might as well be listening to audio of the moon landings. Which wanker thought this was worth uploading? Truly pathetic.
Just remove the "Notes on" and you're left with what this torrent is - A Scandal. Lousy camerawork (Parkinson?) and the sound is awful. Amateur hour. Avoid.
